name: BYU Webcams
tagline: Google Chrome extension that displays many BYU Webcams and updates them often (sometimes every second).  See website for non-extension web version.
body:
### Welcome to BYU Webcams
Brigham Young University has some great public webcams, but finding them can be difficult. So, I built this Google Chrome extension that you can use with one click. All you have to do is install this free Google Chrome app by going to [https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/byu-webcams/popkdjdpaicpdnfpgopjkmhibkngomho](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/byu-webcams/popkdjdpaicpdnfpgopjkmhibkngomho).

Optionally, you may install the app from the source code by downloading it above or by cloning it at Github at [https://github.com/bean5/byu-webcams](https://github.com/bean5/byu-webcams).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the app? Just leave feedback at [https://github.com/bean5/byu-webcams/issues/new](https://github.com/bean5/byu-webcams/issues/new)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
